revised_title: The Effect of Polish on the Reflexion of Light from the Surface of Iceland Spar
tldr: The authors investigate the effect of polishing on the reflection of light from the surface of Iceland spar, using an elliptic analyzer to determine the precise change in the reflected light. They find that polishing does alter the surface state, causing a change in the ratio of the axes and the azimuth of the major axis of the elliptically polarized light.
